front.title: The Big Data Approach for Multipoint Alternate Marking method

abstract.t: This document introduces a new approach for the Alternate Marking method. It is called Big Data Multipoint Alternate Marking method and, starting from the methodology described in RFC 8321 and draft- ietf-ippm-multipoint-alt-mark, it explains how to implement performance measurement analytics on the Network Management System by analysing the raw data of the network nodes.
